sentences.en: An interval of a year elapsed before we were able to return.
sentences.cn: 隔了一年我们才得以返回.

sentences.en: And, after a long interval: " Oh, Scarlett, you mustn't stay here.
sentences.cn: 歇了一会儿又说: " 啊, 思嘉, 你得带着韦德一起离开.

sentences.en: Break up the interval ( a, b ) into small enough intervals.
sentences.cn: 把〔a, b〕 分为一串充分小的小区间.

sentences.en: During the interval, Linton superintended a prize draw.
sentences.cn: 中间休息时，林顿组织了一次抽奖。

sentences.en: During the interval, wine was served.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息时有葡萄酒供应。

sentences.en: England were two goals behind at the interval.
sentences.cn: 中场休息时英格兰队落后两球。

sentences.en: He left the room, returning after a short interval with a message.
sentences.cn: 他离开房间，过了一会儿就带回来一条消息。

sentences.en: In the interval a blond boy dressed in white serenaded the company on the flute.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息时，一位身着白衣的金发男孩用长笛为来宾演奏了一支小夜曲。

sentences.en: Sleep — during this interval is out of the question.
sentences.cn: 要在这样的间歇里睡觉是不可能的.

sentences.en: The audience were going out for the interval.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息时观众走出了剧场.

sentences.en: The ferry service has restarted after an interval of 12 years.
sentences.cn: 时隔12年之后，轮渡服务又重新开通了。

sentences.en: The goal that decided the match came just before the interval.
sentences.cn: 决定本场比赛结果的进球是在中场休息前一刻打入的。

sentences.en: The interval between the two posts measures thirty meters.
sentences.cn: 那两根柱间的距离为三十米.

sentences.en: The interval between the two trees measures 40 feet.
sentences.cn: 这两棵树的间隔是40英尺.

sentences.en: The interval OC is known as the domain of dependence.
sentences.cn: 区间OC叫做相关域.

sentences.en: the light flashed at intervals.
sentences.cn: 灯光不时地闪烁。

sentences.en: the path is marked with rocks at intervals.
sentences.cn: 小路每隔一定的距离就有石头做标记。

sentences.en: There was a long interval before he anwsered the telephone.
sentences.cn: 隔了好久他才回了电话.

sentences.en: Trees had been planted at regular intervals.
sentences.cn: 树已按均距栽种。

sentences.en: We can get some drinks in the interval.
sentences.cn: 我们可以在幕间休息时喝点什么。

phrases.tran_cn: 重现期，重复周期；脉冲周期
温度间距，温度间隔；温度范围

trans.tran_cn: 间隔，幕间休息，（数学）区间
trans.tran_en: the period of time between two events, activities etc
